Title: Test Automation, Planning, and Management concepts
Description: Scenario based and practical guidance for test automation, planning and management of test plans, test cases and shared steps as part of project lifecycle.
HomeWiki:
*** THIS PROJECT HAS BEEN MOVED ***
See library of tooling and guidance solutions (aka.ms/vsarsolutions) for details.

Project Description

This Visual Studio ALM Ranger project has the primary goal of delivering scenario based and practical guidance for test automation, planning and management of test plans, test cases and shared steps when going to the next sprint, next release and when working with multiple code branches.

Visual Studio ALM Rangers

This guidance is created by the Visual Studio ALM Rangers, who have the mission to provide out of band solutions for missing features and/or guidance. This content was created with support from Microsoft Product Group, members of Microsoft Services, Microsoft Most Valued Professionals (MVPs) and technical specialists from technology communities around the globe, giving you a real-world view from the field, where the technology has been tested and used.

What is included in the downloads?

  • Test planning and management guidance
  • Test automation concepts
